title: Need A Red Please
body: I have been Platinum the last 2 season's of LoL because I have played from season 1 and have gotten better at the game. I also work for our Military as a contractor and travel every week to a new base to lay plans out. I have played ranked every season and been fine but now im banned because they think im boosted??? I was Platinum 5 last season and I was banned in Platinum 4 this season how can you think I was boosted? Pretty much If you have a job were you travel alot you cant play ranked at all is what riot is saying by banning me.
